sen.j: 和歌集（わかしゅう）とは、和歌を編集したもの。
sen.e: Wakashu is a collection of waka (Japanese poetry).
Wakashu is a collection of waka (Japanese poetry).
Wakashu is a collection of waka (Japanese poetry).

sen.j: 単に歌集（かしゅう）ともいう。
sen.e: Also simply called "Kashu" (a collection of poetry).
Also simply called "Kashu" (a collection of poetry).
Also simply called Kashu (a collection of poetry).
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.j: 代表的なものに、勅撰和歌集（帝王の命で国が編纂したもの）として『古今和歌集』や『新古今和歌集』などがある。
sen.e: Examples of famous wakashu are Chokusen wakashu (anthology of poetry compiled by Imperial command) such as "Kokin Wakashu" (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry) and "Shin Kokin Wakashu" (NEW Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry).

Examples of famous wakashu are Chokusen wakashu (anthologies compiled by Imperial command) such as "Kokin Wakashu" (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry) and "Shin Kokin Wakashu" (New Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry).

Examples of famous wakashu are Chokusen wakashu (anthologies compiled by Imperial command) such as "Kokin Wakashu" (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry) and "Shin Kokin Wakashu" (New Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry).

sen.j: また、小倉百人一首などのように個人が撰出した和歌集（私撰集）もある。
sen.e: There are also personal collection of poetry called Shikashu such as "Ogura Hyakunin Isshu" (The Ogura's Sequence of One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets).
There are also personal collections of poetry called Shikashu such as "Ogura Hyakunin Isshu" (The Ogura's Sequence of One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets).
There are also personal collections of poetry called Shisenshu such as "Ogura Hyakunin Isshu" (The Ogura's Sequence of 100 Poems by 100 Poets).

sen.j: また、一人の歌人の和歌を編集したものと多くの歌人の和歌を編集したものとがある。
sen.e: Some wakashu are collections of poetry by one poet while the others are collections of poems by many poets.
Some wakashu are collections of poetry by one poet while the others are collections of poems by many poets.
Some wakashu are collections of poetry by one poet while the others are collections of poems by many poets.
